speciesSimpleName.dlcontext: Common term for species. Enum: Cattle, Deer, Goats, Sheep

speciesBinomialName.dlcontext: Species Binomial Name is used in the Animal item combining Genus and Species, e.g. Bos taurus (cattle).

sex.dlcontext: The gender or sex of the animal. This may be combined with state information to indicate the fertility status of the animal. Enumeration values: Male, Female or NULL(for unknowns).

fertilityStatus.dlcontext: Describes if an animal is known to be fertile or not, inlcuding if it has been neutered. Values - Unknown, Fertile, Infertile, Neutered, Cryptorchid

reproductiveStatus.dlcontext: Describes whether an animal is pregnant at the time of stock reconciliation. Note this may change many time over an animal's life.Values = Unknown, Cycling, Not Cycling, Pregnant, Involuting

birthYear.dlcontext: The contemporary group or cohort for the year of birth into which animals are categorised. Known as YearBorn in many systems.This is a derived field, calculated from the Birth Date where available. It is included here as some systems interchange this data. Note that in some occasional circumstances, this may be different by 1 from the year component of the birth date (e.g. an animal born early in the northern hemisphere or late in the southern hemisphere).

birthCohort.dlcontext: Describes the season within the birth year, most likely calculated from the birth date.

birthDate.dlcontext: Date on which animal was born.

birthDateConfidence.dlcontext: 3 character string with positional charcters representing Year Month Date (YMD). Uses a variation on the Date Accuracy Indicator used by the Australian Institute of Health and Welfare2, adjusted to match the format of ISO dates. Values are A  accurate, E  estimate, U  unknown (value=A, E or U) EG. AEU means Year Accurate, Month Estimated and Date Unknown.

breedAssessed.dlcontext: Visual assessment of animal's primary or major breed. Known as Breed in many systems.

stockClassId.dlcontext: Reference of the Stock Class the animal belongs to

stockClassName.dlcontext: Name of the stock class the animal belongs to

enterpriseUse.dlcontext: current values are: [Capital, Trading, Genetics, Dairy] - stock tends to be capital or trading or genetics and may also be dairy (or not) - could add Meat, Fibre

groupLocation.dlcontext: Location identifier to which the group belongs. Data type to be determined, most likely NAIT Location.

groupName.dlcontext: Textual name of the group within the location.

groupType.dlcontext: Distinguishes between a physical management group (a mob of some sort) and other sorts of groupings such as a logical group of animals for analysis, or a planned group (a draft list). Values = Physical, Logical, Planned, NULL

groupId.dlcontext: Internal ID for group in source system. Identification of a collective group of animals, through a unique group identifier.e.g.urn:nzl:pri:animal:sil:GroupID:1

quantity.dlcontext: Describes the Number of stock units in a transaction

valueType.dlcontext: Describes the type of the monetary value, Unknown = 0, $/unit =1 , $/head = 2, total $ = 3

meanWt.dlcontext: Average live weight (kg) recorded on a group of animals.

netValue.dlcontext: Describes the net value of the stock

netUnitVal.dlcontext: Describes the value of one unit (Net Value / Quantity)

unit.dlcontext: Describes the unit of measure for the item in the transaction-/head, /kg

animals.dlcontext: Points to a session of animal data (Optional)
